short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple task duration tracking extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is a task duration tracker. It allows users to log the start and end times of tasks, measure the time spent on each task, and see the total time dedicated to them. The interface enables users to add a name and description for each task, start and stop the timer, and save tasks. Recorded tasks are listed, showing their start and end times as well as their durations. Users can also delete or reset task entries. This extension is designed to help manage work processes more efficiently and simplify time tracking.
